Now, the claim says Shakhtyor was eliminated and scored no goals. Wait, that doesn't make sense because if they scored five goals in aggregate, they didn't score zero. Also, being eliminated would mean losing both legs or overall. Cracovia's agg is 1 -5, so they probably lost both legs.

Wait, no—elimination depends on who is advanced. If this is a knockout tournament, the higher agg would progress. Here, Cracovia has 1-5, so Shakhtyor likely won both legs, meaning Cracovia is eliminated. But Shakhtyor scored goals in both legs, so they can't have scored no goals.

Therefore, the claim that Shakhtyor was eliminated and scored no goals is entirely incorrect.
